pages.text: $(li)The Gold Candelabra is a new kind of light source. $(br)$(li)It can be placed on the floor, wall, or even ceilling.

$(li)This block can be turned off with water and $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/splash_water_bottle)Splash Water Bottles$(/l) and lit up with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charge$(/l), flaming $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l).
